00496 #define TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, class_name, label, propagator)\
00497   {  \
00498     EUROPA::ConstraintEngine* ce = (EUROPA::ConstraintEngine*) assembly.getComponent("ConstraintEngine"); \
00499     REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(ce->getCESchema(), class_name, #label, #propagator);\
00500   }

00503   REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00504
